name: 乌鸦 - Crows
description: Protect the Mafia, or be a traitor in Crows online.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2.3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 - 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2048 MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
